alert.note: Alert for Rice (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 7:36PM CDT until August 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RICE COUNTY... At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Faribault, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dundas around 745 PM CDT. Northfield around 750 PM CDT. Nerstrand around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bridgewater, Ruskin, Faribault Airport and Nerstrand Big Woods State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
